body.p: The Wine development release 1.1.9 is now available.

What's new in this release:
A large number of regression test fixes.
Performance improvements in memory management.
Improved POP3 support in inetcomm.
Initial implementation of the XInput DLL.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
